section.title: The ReservedCheckoutAction
section.p: To invoke a reserved check out from a sitemap pipeline, you use The ReservedCheckoutAction.
section.source: <map:act type="reserved-checkout"> <map:generate src="content/rc/{exception}.xsp" type="serverpages"> <map:parameter name="user" value="{user}"/> <map:parameter name="filename" value="{filename}"/> <map:parameter name="date" value="{date}"/> </map:generate> <map:transform src="xslt/rc/rco-exception.xsl"/> <map:serialize/> </map:act>

section.title: The ReservedCheckoutTestAction
section.p: The ReservedCheckoutTestAction checks out a document only if this isn't already checked out
section.source: <map:act type="reserved-checkout-test"> <map:generate type="serverpages" src="../../content/rc/{exception}.xsp"> <map:parameter name="user" value="{user}"/> <map:parameter name="filename" value="{filename}"/> <map:parameter name="date" value="{date}"/> </map:generate> <map:transform src="../../xslt/rc/rco-exception.xsl"/> <map:serialize/> </map:act>

section.title: FileReservedCheckOutException
section.p: When the file cannot be checked out because another user has already checked it out, a fileReservedCheckOutException is thrown:
section.source:
File Reserved Checkout Exception
Could not check out the file
Reason : The resource has already been checked out by another user User: lenya Date: Wed Oct 22 12:02:28 CEST 2003 Filename: /content/authoring/index/index_de.xml
